Abay Bank S.C. establishment was back in 2002, and started its official operations on October 25, 2003 (based on the Ethiopian Calendar) with a subscribed capital of Birr 174.5 million and a paid-up capital of Birr 125.8 million. With a 7 million birr worth invested brand new logo, since then cultivates a strong local presence, often feeling like the community's steadfast guardian accompanied by 823 founding members and 4,537 shareholders as of  2024.Its innovative mobile platforms hum with the energy of the Blue Nile (also known as Ethiopia’s Great Abay River), connecting rural and urban customers seamlessly, has made it a leading financial institution in Ethiopia. The fact is the River presents a wealth of opportunities for harnessing its power to drive economic growth and development as it holds a significant place in the country’s natural landscape and cultural heritage that embodies the country's ambitious spirit in the long-run.Overall, Abay Bank, while perhaps not the flashiest one in the list, the company’s reliability as well as best-in-class banking services echoes the enduring strength of the country's highlands. Labelled as a “SOURCE OF GREATNESS,” it is a catalyst for growth through empowering people, and driving the engine to unlock their full potential by aiming to reach heights they never thought possible regarding the economic, and ecological importance of Ethiopia. اختتمت قطر للسياحة و Visit Qatar مشاركتهما بنجاح في النسخة الثانية والثلاثين من معرض سوق السفر العربي (ATM) 2025، والذي أُقيم في مركز دبي التجاري العالمي في الفترة من 28 أبريل إلى 1 مايو.وقادت Visit Qatar وقطر للسياحة وفداً يضم 46 من أبرز شركائها حيث تم تسليط الضوء على التنوع في عروض قطر السياحية من خلال جناح مميز نال جائزة من قبل منظمين المعرض لتصميمه المبتكر، والذي اعتمد على مواد صديقة للبيئة وتقنيات رقمية ذكية، بما يعكس دور دولة قطر الريادي في السياحة المستدامة. كما شهد الجناح زيارات رفيعة المستوى، وعدة اجتماعات رفيعة المستوى مع عدد من الشخصيات البارزة في قطاع السياحة الإقليمي والعالمي تركز البحث فيها على سبل التعاون الثنائي وتعزيز آفاق الشراكات الاستراتيجية.hashtag#قطر_للسياحة -Qatar Tourism and Visit Qatar successfully concluded their participation in the 32nd edition of the Arabian Travel Market (ATM) 2025, held from April 28 to May 1 at the Dubai World Trade Centre.Leading a delegation of 46 partners, Visit Qatar and Qatar Tourism showcased the country’s diverse tourism offerings in an innovative pavilion that was recognized with the Sustainability Award by ATM for its smart and eco-friendly design, reflecting the state of Qatar’s leadership in sustainable tourism.Qatar’s pavilion at ATM attracted high-level visits and hosted several meetings with prominent figures from the regional and global tourism sectors, where opportunities for bilateral cooperation and ways to enhance strategic partnerships were discussed.hashtag#QatarTourism

𝘾𝙤𝙣𝙣𝙚𝙘𝙩𝙞𝙤𝙣𝙨 𝙩𝙝𝙖𝙩 𝙏𝙧𝙖𝙣𝙨𝙛𝙤𝙧𝙢: 𝙁𝙧𝙤𝙢 𝘽𝙤𝙖𝙧𝙙𝙧𝙤𝙤𝙢𝙨 𝙩𝙤 𝘽𝙧𝙖𝙣𝙙𝙨Monday mornings used to mean meetings. Now they mean momentum.At this year’s ATM, I was reconnecting with minds building cities, reimagining travel, shaping experience, and investing in innovation. These relationships aren’t new. They’re nurtured.I caught up with some powerful minds I’ve long respected: @Haussain alblooshi Dubai Holding @Mohammed Sarhan Emirates @ Brigadier General Dubai Police  Denys Hryvas, Sam Stephen Miral Miral Experiences and @ ZohaibSiwani Seven (reunion), Dubai Department of Economy and Tourism Mobin Philips flydubai teamLab Inc. Netflix featured Entrepreneur @Ebraheem al samadi @Andre – Start Reverse at Rove Hotels Shazia Ahmed - Emaar Hospitality Group And as I reflected on every handshake, every 5-minute strategy chat, every knowing glance between builders and believers, a truth sharpened:𝙒𝙚’𝙧𝙚 𝙣𝙤𝙩 𝙟𝙪𝙨𝙩 𝙗𝙪𝙞𝙡𝙙𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙘𝙤𝙢𝙥𝙖𝙣𝙞𝙚𝙨. 𝙒𝙚’𝙧𝙚 𝙨𝙝𝙖𝙥𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙚𝙘𝙤𝙨𝙮𝙨𝙩𝙚𝙢𝙨.Today’s HR leaders are expected to wear multiple lenses—financial fluency, emotional range, operational precision, brand intuition.Not because it sounds impressive, but because business demands it.In these rooms, I wasn’t “just HR.” I was:-> Reading talent signals-> Listening beneath headlines-> Linking mindset to market movementBecause that’s what I do:Whether it’s helping a company scale across borders, or defining the heartbeat of a brand from the inside out—I don’t just work with people. I work through them to unlock velocity.Because business today moves through people.As i continue to focus on:-> Strategic hiring that aligns with long-term value-> Culture architecture that scales beyond buzzwords-> Real-time people insights that drive business velocityThese conversations reminded me:𝙍𝙚𝙡𝙖𝙩𝙞𝙤𝙣𝙨𝙝𝙞𝙥𝙨 𝙖𝙧𝙚𝙣’𝙩 𝙖 𝙧𝙚𝙬𝙖𝙧𝙙—𝙩𝙝𝙚𝙮’𝙧𝙚 𝙩𝙝𝙚 𝙧𝙪𝙣𝙬𝙖𝙮.And here’s the truth every hashtag#Global HR Leader knows:In today’s business environment, talent strategy isn’t just about people—it’s about pattern recognition.𝙔𝙤𝙪 𝙢𝙪𝙨𝙩 𝙧𝙚𝙖𝙙 𝙙𝙮𝙣𝙖𝙢𝙞𝙘𝙨 𝙡𝙞𝙠𝙚 𝙖 𝙛𝙤𝙪𝙣𝙙𝙚𝙧, 𝙡𝙞𝙨𝙩𝙚𝙣 𝙡𝙞𝙠𝙚 𝙖 𝙘𝙤𝙖𝙘𝙝, 𝙖𝙣𝙙 𝙢𝙤𝙫𝙚 𝙡𝙞𝙠𝙚 𝙖𝙣 𝙤𝙥𝙚𝙧𝙖𝙩𝙤𝙧.To everyone building, creating, and transforming—thank you for the inspiration.If your team is hiring, scaling, or simply stuck—let’s talk.Or better yet… drop a dm.hashtag#StrategicHR hashtag#ATM2025 hashtag#GlobalLeadership hashtag#PeoplePower hashtag#HRBusinessPartner hashtag#TransformationStartsHere hashtag#CultureShaping hashtag#ExecutiveSearch hashtag#MondayMomentum hashtag#UAELeadership hashtag#innovation hashtag#management hashtag#career hashtag#opportunity hashtag#hr hashtag#talent hashtag#learning hashtag#development hashtag#coaching hashtag#India hashtag#uae hashtag#Dubai hashtag#abudbhai hashtag#gcc hashtag#global Euphoria Consulting LinkedIn LinkedIn News LinkedIn Talent Solutions Arabian Travel Market

The Maldives as the next major crypto hub? Let's make it happen!According to media reports, the Dubai-based family office MBS Global Investments plans to invest $8.8bn to build a “blockchain and digital assets” financial hub in the Maldives.MBS Global Investments is the family office of Sheikh Nayef Bin Eid Al Thani, a wealthy Qatari who has business interests in the finance, food, hospitality and real estate sectors.Last week, we had plenty of plaudits for Dubai and the UAE as the world's leading crypto hub. Competition is typically seen from the US, Singapore and Hong Kong. Could the Maldives join that list as it looks to diversify away from tourism and fisheries? hashtag#crypto hashtag#cryptohubs hashtag#themaldives hashtag#mbsglobalinvestments

Dubai isn’t just laying roads — it’s laying the blueprint for the future.Backed by the bold vision of HH Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, over AED 150B has been invested in the past 19 years to create a transport network that’s not just world-class — it’s world-leading.And this week, HH Sheikh Hamdan bin Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum doubled down on that mission, bringing together 100+ experts and 50+ global partners at the RTA’s ‘Connecting Bridges’ workshop — focused on solving urban challenges and future-proofing mobility.Some stats that speak for themselves:• 15,000+ km of infrastructure (roads, bridges, tunnels)• 747M+ public transport riders in 2024 — up 6.4% YoY• 2.4B+ cumulative metro riders since 2009• 92.3M passengers through DXB in 2024 — record-breaking• Vision 2030: 25% autonomous trips, 40% green fleetBut this isn’t just about infrastructure.It’s about velocity, vision, and value creation.Mobility fuels over 75% of Dubai’s non-oil GDP.Smart systems attract global FDI.And the D33 agenda? Aiming for a AED 32 trillion economy by 2033.While others catch up, Dubai builds ahead — setting the pace with clean, connected, scalable systems designed for 2040 and beyond.This is strategic city-building — and real leadership in motion.Grateful to witness it, and even more proud to contribute to it.We’re nearing 10,000 followers — and it’s thanks to all of you.If this resonated, I’d appreciate you sharing my profile or this post with your network.Let’s keep building a space for high-level insights, bold thinking, and real conversations.hashtag#Dubai2030 hashtag#SmartMobility hashtag#D33Agenda hashtag#UrbanExcellence hashtag#VisionDriven hashtag#DubaiRealEstate hashtag#FutureOfCities hashtag#RTA hashtag#LeadershipInAction hashtag#MobilityMatters

Username: Growiieze Real Estate LLCGrowiieze Real Estate LLC
Post Content:
From Launch to Exit:How Dubai’s Best Projects Create Returns Before They’re Built— A Growiieze PerspectiveIn most markets, you buy. You wait. You exit.In Dubai, the smartest investors?They’re exiting before handover.Because in well-zoned, well-timed off-plan projects —value isn’t created at completion.It’s created during construction.Here’s how:• 📈 15%–35% Value Uplift Pre-HandoverTop-tier off-plan projects have seen capital appreciation from launch to handover ranging between 15%–35% — especially in low-density branded or community-based offerings.• ⏳ Exit Timeline: 14–28 MonthsInvestors are flipping during construction or just before handover — without ever furnishing or renting.It’s velocity, not holding, that defines this bracket.• 🧭 Supply Timing = ROI AccelerationThe sweet spot? Early phases in areas where infrastructure is 90% complete, but sentiment is still 60% priced in.• 🏗️ Developer Credibility = Exit PremiumsProjects from developers with clear delivery records + resale support ecosystems =Higher resale volume, faster assignments, and better buyer trust.• 🔒 Limited Supply, Locked-in PricingIn a market where new launches keep inflating, locked-in early bird pricing becomes its own asset.Investors are monetizing access, not just appreciation.Growiieze Final Thought:Dubai’s best real estate returns aren’t always made after handover.They’re made between the brochure and the balcony.Because when timing, product, and zone align —capital moves before the cranes stop.hashtag#GrowiiezePerspective hashtag#DubaiRealEstate hashtag#SmartInvestinghashtag#OffPlanReturns hashtag#CapitalVelocity hashtag#HNIStrategyhashtag#ROIInsights hashtag#BuiltWithPurpose hashtag#RealEstateLogichashtag#InvestorLens hashtag#Dubai2025 hashtag#AssetStackinghashtag#ExitBeforeHandover hashtag#GlobalCapitalFlow hashtag#GrowiiezeInsightshashtag#MiddleEastGrowth hashtag#PropertyInvestment hashtag#Dubai

سعدت بالمشاركة في تمثيل Oman Airports Management Company ضمن جناح “إكتشف عُمان” في سوق السفر العربي 2025 بدبي على مدى 4 ايام والذي أُقيم خلال الفترة من 28 إبريل إلى 1 مايو 2025.يعد هذا المعرض السنوي من أبرز الفعاليات العالمية في قطاع السفر والسياحة، حيث يجمع أبرز الجهات في القطاع من مختلف دول العالم لتعزيز التعاون والشراكات. وقد شكل المعرض فرصة قيّمة لعرض المقومات السياحية الفريدة لسلطنة عُمان، وتسليط الضوء على دور مطاراتنا كمحور استراتيجي للسياحة الى جانب تعزيز التواصل مع الشركاء الإقليميين والدوليين.نتوجه بجزيل الشكر الى Ministry of Heritage and Tourism - Sultanate of Oman على جهودهم المستمرة لتعزيز السياحة في عُمان وابراز ثراء عُمان الثقافي للعالم.I was pleased to represent Oman Airports Management Company as part of the “Experience Oman” pavilion at Arabian Travel Market 2025 in Dubai, held over four days from April 28 to May 1, 2025.This annual exhibition is one of the world’s leading events in the travel and tourism sector, bringing together key industry players from around the globe to foster collaboration and build partnerships.The event provided a valuable opportunity to showcase the unique tourism potential of the Sultanate of Oman, highlight the strategic role of our airports in supporting tourism, and strengthen engagement with regional and international partners.We extend our sincere thanks to the Ministry of Heritage and Tourism - Sultanate of Oman for their continuous efforts to promote tourism in Oman and highlight the richness of Omani culture on the global stage.

كتير بنقدم على شغل و بيطلب منك تبعت voice note تعرف نفسك بالانجلش و لو بعته غلط او مبعتش خالص مش بيترد عليك "دة اول سؤال في اي انترفيو"-introduce yourself in English or: -tell me about yourself in English or: -brand yourself or: -could you tell me a brief about yourself ? اللى هو "عرف نفسك"-بالرغم من بساطة السؤال ، إلا أنه مهم جدا و في ناس كتير مش بتعرف تجاوب علية صح - اول حاجة لو اتسألت انجلش يبقي هتجاوب انجلش و (هنا بيبقي عايز يقيم اللغة عندك) ، فالبتالى لازم تكون مجهز اجابتة كويس و مظبطها بالانجلش ، لو اتسألت عربي تجاوب عربي .- و بلاش تقول تفاصيل شخصية زي عندك كام اخ و اخت او اخواتك بيشتغلو اية -نقدر نقسم سؤال ال introduction in English ل 5 نقط مهمة :1. personal information -المعلومات الشخصيهو دى بتقول فيها اسمك و سنك و محل اقامتك ex:- My name is (Ahmed), I'm 24 (twenty four) years old, i live in (Maadi)2. Education-مؤهلك الدراسيالكلية و الجامعة اللى اتخرجت منها و سنة التخرج ex: i graduated from faculty of (commerce) accounting (department) with overall good (grad) in 2022 (twenty twenty two) (or) I've a bachelor's degree in accounting form faculty of commerce.....و نكمل بنفس الطريقة 3. your experience -خبراتك السابقةو دى بتقول فيها الشغل اللى اشتغلتة ( من الاحدث للاقدم ).بتوضح الاول( طبيعة شغلك) و بعدها (المكان العمل) او( اسم الشركة) و بعدها )الوقت او المدة) بدات الشغل امتى و سيبتة امتىex: about my work experience, -currently... Hello, just prepared some notes for my Ethiopian Fellows who are looking for opportunities in UAE.This is just from my personal experience, not a professional guide but one common question I get is: “Should I come to Dubai to find a job or apply from Ethiopia?"Both options work. If you get hired from Ethiopia, your employer will process your employment visa which is ideal. But most interviews in Dubai happen face-to-face, so being here increases your chances of getting hired faster.The other thing to consider is looking for an intern or entry‑level hire as many Dubai companies will sponsor your work permit even if you have no local experience, and internships often convert into full‑time roles compared to mid-senior to senior positions as most of the companies require UAE experience. I highly suggest you to be active on LinkedIn, follow companies with the industry that aligns to you and message HR staff as the connection you build is highly valuable, even if you might not get a fast result in the long term it will highly benefits you in your career advancement.Make sure your cv is tailored and ATS friendly based on the job description and prepare a cover letter for each application (See this guide written by GulfTalent on how to prepare your cv https://lnkd.in/dyDituwF ).One important thing to keep in mind is the job market is competitive so it's better to have strong technical skills and Prepare a portfolio of your past work or projects. This helps you stand out and gives employers something concrete to review during interviews.Try to do a research about things like: Cost of living, Visa process and Company reputation once you start getting offers. Just a reminder NEVER PAY anyone that says "we will provide you the job but you have pay for admin fee, visa fee or any other form of payment.These are sites commonly used for the job search here beyond the company portal:- https://www.linkedin.com/- https://ae.indeed.com/ - https://lnkd.in/d2D-PXAd- https://lnkd.in/drzMFAvz- https://lnkd.in/dQZuhvnyBeyond the above job portals focus on the company's portal as well as some applications require a detailed application process, they upload it on their career page.Hope this helps someone out there maybe I will add some additional guide. Feel free to share, comment, or message me if you have questions and I will try to answer them.

Our 4th episode of hashtag#Psych_Legal_Talk is out to be shared with you, if you have an interest in the subject of the divorce of Muslims in the UAE, applying UAE Federal Decree Law 41 of 2024on Personal Status matters.We discuss how Sharia allows a man to pronounce his No-Fault Divorce, his Talaq, and a woman to file for divorce or Khula, while the UAE Non Muslims Laws allow women and men the same right of No Fault Divorce, and grants compensation payable by the party who has caused the end of the marriage.Muslims Law is unfortunately void of any mention of compensation to be paid to the party who has suffered harm by the other party, allowing divorce without any  reprecussions.  To watch the episode please visit the YouTube link below.https://lnkd.in/dhRSP5xwالحلقة الرابعة من hashtag#Psych_Legal_Talk أصبحت متاحة الآن!في هذه الحلقة، نغوص في موضوع طلاق المسلمين في قانون دولة الإمارات، وخاصة في ضوء المرسوم بقانون اتحادي رقم 41 لسنة 2024 بشأن الأحوال الشخصية.تجيز الشريعة للرجل المسلم إصدار الطلاق بدون إثبات ضرر أو سبب (الطلاق التعسفي)، بينما تمنح قوانين الإمارات الخاصة بغير المسلمين الحق المتساوي للرجال والنساء في طلب الطلاق بدون خطأ، كما تُتيح تعويضاً مالياً للطرف المتضرر من انهيار العلاقة الزوجية.لكن و الأسف فإن قانون الأحوال الشخصية للمسلمين في الإمارات لا يتضمن حالياً أي نصوص تتعلق بتعويض الطرف المتضرر، مما يعرض مؤسسة الزواج للانتهاك و عدم التقدير.تابعونا بينما نستعرض الأبعاد القانونية والنفسية والاجتماعية لهذه القضية.امشاهدة الحلقة على اليوتيوب الرجاء الضغط على الرابط https://lnkd.in/dhRSP5xw

Dubai's population boom is creating unprecedented real estate opportunities for investors. In the first quarter of 2025 alone, the city welcomed nearly 90,000 new residents, equating to almost 1,000 individuals daily. This surge in population isn't merely a statistic; it's a clear indicator of escalating demand for housing, infrastructure, and commercial properties that surpasses all expectations.For investors, this surge signifies an ideal moment to establish a presence in a market where various sectors are experiencing remarkable growth:- Apartment prices have risen by 20% year-on-year- Villa prices have seen a significant surge of 29%- Office rents have escalated by over 20%- Residential rents are steadily increasingAlthough there is an anticipated influx of over 61,000 new units in 2025, the existing demand levels suggest that this supply may not be adequate to rebalance the market dynamics. For those with a long-term investment perspective, it's crucial to note that Dubai is not just attracting residents but also talent, capital, and businesses. The rapid population growth forms the cornerstone of real estate value, and in Dubai, this growth is occurring at an unprecedented pace.If you are considering transforming these statistics into profitable returns, let's engage in a conversation. Our team is on-site and prepared to provide you with expert guidance on seizing the opportunities presented by Dubai's thriving real estate market.hashtag#DubaiRealEstate hashtag#PropertyInvestment hashtag#UAEGrowth hashtag#HiveNetwork hashtag#InvestorInsight hashtag#RealEstate2025 hashtag#PopulationBoom hashtag#SmartInvesting

📌 يعني إيه Skill Inventory؟ وليه هو مهم لأي HR؟ 🧐 من أهم الأدوات اللي بتساعد الـ HR إنه يكون دايمًا جاهز لأي احتياج أو قرار في الشركة هي Skill Inventory أو "جرد المهارات"! 🎯🧠وده ببساطة عبارة عن قاعدة بيانات شاملة بتجمع المهارات الفعلية لكل الموظفين في الشركة. مش بس المسمى الوظيفي أو التخصص، لكن كمان المهارات الحقيقية اللي بيستخدموها في شغلهم ✅🔍 ليه نعمل Skill Inventory؟🔹 نحدد الفجوات المهارية بدقة 🕵️‍♂️ 🔹 نخطط للتدريب والتطوير (TNA) بناءً على احتياج حقيقي 📈 🔹 نستعد للتعاقب الوظيفي (Succession Planning) 🔄 🔹 نوزع المهام بشكل أذكى 🧩 🔹 نحدد الترقيات وفرص التطوير بناءً على إمكانيات فعلية مش مجرد توقعات 🪄📂 إزاي نبدأ؟1️⃣ اجمع بيانات المهارات من مصادر مختلفة: 📄 الـ CV – 🗣️ مقابلات – 📊 تقييم الأداء – 👨‍💼 المدير المباشر2️⃣ صنّف المهارات حسب نوعها:🗣️ Language Skills: زي اللغة الإنجليزية، الفرنسية... 💼 Technical Skills: التسويق الرقمي، المحاسبة، البرمجة... 🤝 Soft Skills: القيادة، التواصل، العمل الجماعي... 💻 Computer Skills: Excel – PowerPoint – HRIS Systems...3️⃣ افصل كمان المهارات حسب المستوى الوظيفي:👤 Specialist 🧑‍💼 Senior 👨‍💼 Team Lead / Manager✅ كده تقدر تبني صورة أوضح لكل موظف في الشركة وتحدد: 🔹 مين محتاج يتطور في إيه؟ 🔹 مين يقدر يترقى أو يمسك مشروع معين؟ 🔹 إزاي تبني خطة تطوير حقيقية مبنية على الواقع مش الافتراضات؟📌 خليك فاكر! Skill Inventory مش مجرد ملف، ده أداة قوية بتخلي قراراتك مبنية على بيانات حقيقية، وتساعدك تخطط وتطور شركتك بالشكل الصح 💪📊

AED 440 million) for infrastructure development, market studies, and technical preparations over the next 3 years, with construction set to begin by end of 2025.𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗶𝘁 𝗺𝗮𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀:- Strategically located on the global maritime crossroads, where over 12% of world trade flows through the Suez Canal.- East Port Said can accommodate mega-vessels carrying over 18,000 containers.- Strong potential for investment in industry, smart logistics, and supply chain connectivity.𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗺𝗼𝘃𝗲 𝗯𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝘀 𝗼𝗻 𝗮 𝘄𝗮𝘃𝗲 𝗼𝗳 𝗨𝗔𝗘 𝗶𝗻𝘃𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗘𝗴𝘆𝗽𝘁, 𝗶𝗻𝗰𝗹𝘂𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴:- Over 𝗔𝗘𝗗 𝟮𝟬 𝗯𝗶𝗹𝗹𝗶𝗼𝗻 invested by ADQ across key sectors.- Development of Safaga Port infrastructure on the Red Sea, exceeding EGP 500 million in value.- Joint projects in food security, green technology, and logistics.This is more than an agreement — it’s a platform for long-term regional integration, designed to attract global players and unlock shared prosperity between nations.hashtag#UAE hashtag#Egypt hashtag#StrategicPartnership hashtag#ADPorts hashtag#KIZAD hashtag#SuezCanal hashtag#RegionalTrade hashtag#LogisticsHub hashtag#FDI hashtag#MiddleEastEconomy hashtag#GreenGrowth hashtag#PublicPrivatePartnership

Al Maryah Island shined today — not as a world class financial hub only but as the beating heart of Arab brotherhoodToday, on the glittering shores of Al Maryah Island Abu Dhabi’s crown jewel of finance, diplomacy, and modern luxury, the President of the UAE, HH Sheikh Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, hosted a formal lunch banquet in honor of H.H. Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad bin Khalifa Al Thani, Emir of Qatar.But this gathering was far more than ceremonial.It was a profound affirmation of the unbreakable brotherhood that ties the UAE and Qatar two nations that, together, are reshaping the economic and diplomatic landscape of the Gulf.Let’s unpack the significance:Al Maryah Island: A Symbol of Vision and PowerOnce a quiet natural island, Al Maryah has risen to global prominence as:1. The home of ADGM a world class and one of the world’s fastest-growing financial centers2. A nexus of international business, investment, luxury, and hospitality3. A stage where Gulf leadership hosts historic moments sending a message of unity, progress, and ambition to the worldUAE & Qatar Ties: Anchoring Gulf StrengthTogether, these nations account for:1. Over $2.4 trillion in combined GDP (32% of the GCC)2. Massive sovereign wealth influence through Abu Dhabi Investment Authority (ADIA), Mubadala, ADQ and Qatar Investment Authority 3. Expanding cross-border partnerships in energy, logistics, technology, and financeToday’s meeting wasn’t just about diplomacy it was a statement. That the Gulf’s true power lies in its brotherhood, alignment, and global reach.On Al Maryah Island, HH Sheikh Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan and H.H. Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad bin Khalifa Al Thani stood not just as neighbors, but as visionary leaders forging a shared future that will shape the Gulf, inspire the Arab world, and command the attention of the globe.

UAE Breaks Global Barriers: Introducing the World’s Boldest AI Education Revolution for Future GenerationsIn a move that places the UAE firmly at the forefront of global innovation, the government has officially approved the introduction of Artificial Intelligence (AI) as a mandatory subject across all public schools from kindergarten to grade 12 starting with the 2025–2026 academic year.Let’s break this down:Global AI Landscape: Where the World Stands1. The global AI market is projected to soar from $207 billion (2023) to over $1.85 trillion by 2030 2. PwC forecasts AI will contribute $15.7 trillion to the global economy by 2030 more than the combined GDP of China and India today.3. Yet fewer than 11 countries worldwide currently have government-endorsed K-12 AI curricula (UNESCO, 2024), putting the UAE at the very top of global innovators.The Workforce Revolution:• The World Economic Forum’s 2025 Future of Jobs Report projects:1. 170 million new jobs will be created globally by 2030.2. 92 million jobs will be displaced.3. Net gain: 78 million new roles many of them requiring advanced digital and AI-related skills.• Employers estimate 39% of workers core skills will change by 2030, underscoring the urgency of early, system-wide reskilling.UAE’s AI Strategy 2031:• Boost AI’s share of national GDP by 14% (≈AED 335–352 billion).• Embed AI across priority sectors: healthcare, transportation, climate, renewable energy, and education.• Rank among the world’s top 10 in AI innovation, governance, and testing.• Expand the digital economy’s non-oil GDP share from 11.7% to 20% by the early 2030s.What Makes the UAE’s Curriculum Unique?This isn’t just about teaching kids to code.It’s about:1. Deep understanding of data, algorithms, and ethical frameworks.2. Raising awareness of AI’s societal risks, biases, and transformative power.3. Equipping youth to become creators, regulators, and global innovators not passive tech consumers.Why the UAE Stands Alone GloballyWhere many advanced economies are still debating risks or running small-scale pilots, the UAE is:→ Institutionalizing AI literacy at scale.→ Building national, homegrown AI talent.→ Shaping international benchmarks for ethical, inclusive innovation.This aligns with the country’s boldest ambitions:1. UAE Centennial 2071 to be the best nation in the world by its centenary.2. Dubai Economic Agenda D33 to double the city’s economy in a decade.3. National Innovation Strategy with AI as a central pillar for growth.As HH Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum stated:“Our responsibility is to equip our children for a time unlike ours… with new skills and capabilities to ensure the continued momentum of development and progress in our nation for decades to come.”The UAE is not just preparing to participate in the global AI race it is setting the pace for the world to follow.

Abay Bank S.C. establishment was back in 2002, and started its official operations on October 25, 2003 (based on the Ethiopian Calendar) with a subscribed capital of Birr 174.5 million and a paid-up capital of Birr 125.8 million. With a 7 million birr worth invested brand new logo, since then cultivates a strong local presence, often feeling like the community's steadfast guardian accompanied by 823 founding members and 4,537 shareholders as of  2024.Its innovative mobile platforms hum with the energy of the Blue Nile (also known as Ethiopia’s Great Abay River), connecting rural and urban customers seamlessly, has made it a leading financial institution in Ethiopia. The fact is the River presents a wealth of opportunities for harnessing its power to drive economic growth and development as it holds a significant place in the country’s natural landscape and cultural heritage that embodies the country's ambitious spirit in the long-run.Overall, Abay Bank, while perhaps not the flashiest one in the list, the company’s reliability as well as best-in-class banking services echoes the enduring strength of the country's highlands. Labelled as a “SOURCE OF GREATNESS,” it is a catalyst for growth through empowering people, and driving the engine to unlock their full potential by aiming to reach heights they never thought possible regarding the economic, and ecological importance of Ethiopia. For more, read: https://lnkd.in/dxSz8U7S. hashtag#AbayBank hashtag#EthiopianBanking hashtag#SourceOfGreatness hashtag#BlueNileBanking hashtag#FinancialInclusionEthiopia hashtag#EthiopianEconomy hashtag#BankingInnovation hashtag#CommunityBankingEthiopia hashtag#AbayBank2002 hashtag#EthiopianFinancialInstitution hashtag#EmpoweringEthiopia hashtag#GrowthCatalyst hashtag#ReliableBanking hashtag#DigitalBankingEthiopia hashtag#InvestInEthiopia

A Global Equestrian Masterclass: Dubai’s Godolphin Dominates Four Elite Racing Crowns in One Historic WeekendThis weekend, under the visionary leadership of HH Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Dubai’s Godolphin Racing achieved what few in history have ever done claiming victories across four of the world’s most prestigious horse races:🏇 Kentucky Oaks (USA): Good Cheer🏇 Kentucky Derby (USA): Sovereignty🏇 2000 Guineas (UK): Ruling Court🏇 1000 Guineas (UK): Desert FlowerThis is not just about winning races this is about cementing Dubai’s place at the pinnacle of global sporting and cultural leadership.Why This Matters — and What the Numbers Reveal1. Kentucky Derby (since 1875) → the most-watched horse race in America; $400M in betting handle yearly: 16.7 million global viewers.2. 2000 Guineas Stakes (since 1809) → part of Britain’s Five Classics; top-tier breeding influence across Europe, Asia, and the Middle East.3. 1000 Guineas Stakes (since 1814) → Britain’s premier Classic for 3-year-old fillies; major international breeding and racing impact.4. Kentucky Oaks → 100,000 live spectators: millions of global viewers: elite Grade 1 platform for 3-year-old fillies.Godolphin Global Footprint (2025 Snapshot)1. Founded: 19922. Victories: Over 5,800 global wins across 14 countries3. Major trophies: Dubai World Cup, Melbourne Cup, Epsom Derby, Breeders’ Cup, Prix de l’Arc de Triomphe4. Top recognitions:5. Eclipse Awards (USA) → multiple-time leading owner6. Cartier Racing Awards (UK) → multiple-time owner of the year7. British Champions Series → dominant force in flat racing8. Breeding power: Darley, the Godolphin breeding arm, spans Europe, the U.S., Australia, and Japan, making it one of the world’s largest and most influential bloodstock operations.Strategic Significance: Beyond the RacetrackThis is not just sport it is Dubai’s global ambition in action:• Soft Power & Prestige → Elevating Dubai as a cultural and sporting superpower.• Economic Impact → Anchoring the UAE within a $300 billion global horse racing ecosystem.• Innovation & Excellence → Setting new global standards through advanced veterinary science, world-class training, and elite management.• Cultural Diplomacy → Deepening ties with Europe, the USA, Australia, and Asia showing the world the UAE’s commitment to excellence on every front.The Pride of a Nation, the Vision of a LeaderThis achievement belongs not only to the Godolphin horses, jockeys, and trainers it belongs to Dubai, to the UAE, and to every citizen who dares to dream big.Under the leadership of HH Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Dubai has once again shown the world that its ambition is boundless, its excellence unmatched, and its global leadership undeniable.Here’s to the blue silks, the roaring finish lines, and the unstoppable spirit of Dubai.This is how a nation writes history with courage, vision, and the relentless pursuit of greatness.

اختتمت قطر للسياحة و Visit Qatar مشاركتهما بنجاح في النسخة الثانية والثلاثين من معرض سوق السفر العربي (ATM) 2025، والذي أُقيم في مركز دبي التجاري العالمي في الفترة من 28 أبريل إلى 1 مايو.وقادت Visit Qatar وقطر للسياحة وفداً يضم 46 من أبرز شركائها حيث تم تسليط الضوء على التنوع في عروض قطر السياحية من خلال جناح مميز نال جائزة من قبل منظمين المعرض لتصميمه المبتكر، والذي اعتمد على مواد صديقة للبيئة وتقنيات رقمية ذكية، بما يعكس دور دولة قطر الريادي في السياحة المستدامة. كما شهد الجناح زيارات رفيعة المستوى، وعدة اجتماعات رفيعة المستوى مع عدد من الشخصيات البارزة في قطاع السياحة الإقليمي والعالمي تركز البحث فيها على سبل التعاون الثنائي وتعزيز آفاق الشراكات الاستراتيجية.hashtag#قطر_للسياحة -Qatar Tourism and Visit Qatar successfully concluded their participation in the 32nd edition of the Arabian Travel Market (ATM) 2025, held from April 28 to May 1 at the Dubai World Trade Centre.Leading a delegation of 46 partners, Visit Qatar and Qatar Tourism showcased the country’s diverse tourism offerings in an innovative pavilion that was recognized with the Sustainability Award by ATM for its smart and eco-friendly design, reflecting the state of Qatar’s leadership in sustainable tourism.Qatar’s pavilion at ATM attracted high-level visits and hosted several meetings with prominent figures from the regional and global tourism sectors, where opportunities for bilateral cooperation and ways to enhance strategic partnerships were discussed.hashtag#QatarTourism

𝘾𝙤𝙣𝙣𝙚𝙘𝙩𝙞𝙤𝙣𝙨 𝙩𝙝𝙖𝙩 𝙏𝙧𝙖𝙣𝙨𝙛𝙤𝙧𝙢: 𝙁𝙧𝙤𝙢 𝘽𝙤𝙖𝙧𝙙𝙧𝙤𝙤𝙢𝙨 𝙩𝙤 𝘽𝙧𝙖𝙣𝙙𝙨Monday mornings used to mean meetings. Now they mean momentum.At this year’s ATM, I was reconnecting with minds building cities, reimagining travel, shaping experience, and investing in innovation. These relationships aren’t new. They’re nurtured.I caught up with some powerful minds I’ve long respected: @Haussain alblooshi Dubai Holding @Mohammed Sarhan Emirates @ Brigadier General Dubai Police  Denys Hryvas, Sam Stephen Miral Miral Experiences and @ ZohaibSiwani Seven (reunion), Dubai Department of Economy and Tourism Mobin Philips flydubai teamLab Inc. Netflix featured Entrepreneur @Ebraheem al samadi @Andre – Start Reverse at Rove Hotels Shazia Ahmed - Emaar Hospitality Group And as I reflected on every handshake, every 5-minute strategy chat, every knowing glance between builders and believers, a truth sharpened:𝙒𝙚’𝙧𝙚 𝙣𝙤𝙩 𝙟𝙪𝙨𝙩 𝙗𝙪𝙞𝙡𝙙𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙘𝙤𝙢𝙥𝙖𝙣𝙞𝙚𝙨. 𝙒𝙚’𝙧𝙚 𝙨𝙝𝙖𝙥𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙚𝙘𝙤𝙨𝙮𝙨𝙩𝙚𝙢𝙨.Today’s HR leaders are expected to wear multiple lenses—financial fluency, emotional range, operational precision, brand intuition.Not because it sounds impressive, but because business demands it.In these rooms, I wasn’t “just HR.” I was:-> Reading talent signals-> Listening beneath headlines-> Linking mindset to market movementBecause that’s what I do:Whether it’s helping a company scale across borders, or defining the heartbeat of a brand from the inside out—I don’t just work with people. I work through them to unlock velocity.Because business today moves through people.As i continue to focus on:-> Strategic hiring that aligns with long-term value-> Culture architecture that scales beyond buzzwords-> Real-time people insights that drive business velocityThese conversations reminded me:𝙍𝙚𝙡𝙖𝙩𝙞𝙤𝙣𝙨𝙝𝙞𝙥𝙨 𝙖𝙧𝙚𝙣’𝙩 𝙖 𝙧𝙚𝙬𝙖𝙧𝙙—𝙩𝙝𝙚𝙮’𝙧𝙚 𝙩𝙝𝙚 𝙧𝙪𝙣𝙬𝙖𝙮.And here’s the truth every hashtag#Global HR Leader knows:In today’s business environment, talent strategy isn’t just about people—it’s about pattern recognition.𝙔𝙤𝙪 𝙢𝙪𝙨𝙩 𝙧𝙚𝙖𝙙 𝙙𝙮𝙣𝙖𝙢𝙞𝙘𝙨 𝙡𝙞𝙠𝙚 𝙖 𝙛𝙤𝙪𝙣𝙙𝙚𝙧, 𝙡𝙞𝙨𝙩𝙚𝙣 𝙡𝙞𝙠𝙚 𝙖 𝙘𝙤𝙖𝙘𝙝, 𝙖𝙣𝙙 𝙢𝙤𝙫𝙚 𝙡𝙞𝙠𝙚 𝙖𝙣 𝙤𝙥𝙚𝙧𝙖𝙩𝙤𝙧.To everyone building, creating, and transforming—thank you for the inspiration.If your team is hiring, scaling, or simply stuck—let’s talk.Or better yet… drop a dm.hashtag#StrategicHR hashtag#ATM2025 hashtag#GlobalLeadership hashtag#PeoplePower hashtag#HRBusinessPartner hashtag#TransformationStartsHere hashtag#CultureShaping hashtag#ExecutiveSearch hashtag#MondayMomentum hashtag#UAELeadership hashtag#innovation hashtag#management hashtag#career hashtag#opportunity hashtag#hr hashtag#talent hashtag#learning hashtag#development hashtag#coaching hashtag#India hashtag#uae hashtag#Dubai hashtag#abudbhai hashtag#gcc hashtag#global Euphoria Consulting LinkedIn LinkedIn News LinkedIn Talent Solutions Arabian Travel Market

Dubai isn’t just laying roads — it’s laying the blueprint for the future.Backed by the bold vision of HH Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, over AED 150B has been invested in the past 19 years to create a transport network that’s not just world-class — it’s world-leading.And this week, HH Sheikh Hamdan bin Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum doubled down on that mission, bringing together 100+ experts and 50+ global partners at the RTA’s ‘Connecting Bridges’ workshop — focused on solving urban challenges and future-proofing mobility.Some stats that speak for themselves:• 15,000+ km of infrastructure (roads, bridges, tunnels)• 747M+ public transport riders in 2024 — up 6.4% YoY• 2.4B+ cumulative metro riders since 2009• 92.3M passengers through DXB in 2024 — record-breaking• Vision 2030: 25% autonomous trips, 40% green fleetBut this isn’t just about infrastructure.It’s about velocity, vision, and value creation.Mobility fuels over 75% of Dubai’s non-oil GDP.Smart systems attract global FDI.And the D33 agenda? Aiming for a AED 32 trillion economy by 2033.While others catch up, Dubai builds ahead — setting the pace with clean, connected, scalable systems designed for 2040 and beyond.This is strategic city-building — and real leadership in motion.Grateful to witness it, and even more proud to contribute to it.We’re nearing 10,000 followers — and it’s thanks to all of you.If this resonated, I’d appreciate you sharing my profile or this post with your network.Let’s keep building a space for high-level insights, bold thinking, and real conversations.hashtag#Dubai2030 hashtag#SmartMobility hashtag#D33Agenda hashtag#UrbanExcellence hashtag#VisionDriven hashtag#DubaiRealEstate hashtag#FutureOfCities hashtag#RTA hashtag#LeadershipInAction hashtag#MobilityMatters

Username: Growiieze Real Estate LLCGrowiieze Real Estate LLC
Post Content:
From Launch to Exit:How Dubai’s Best Projects Create Returns Before They’re Built— A Growiieze PerspectiveIn most markets, you buy. You wait. You exit.In Dubai, the smartest investors?They’re exiting before handover.Because in well-zoned, well-timed off-plan projects —value isn’t created at completion.It’s created during construction.Here’s how:• 📈 15%–35% Value Uplift Pre-HandoverTop-tier off-plan projects have seen capital appreciation from launch to handover ranging between 15%–35% — especially in low-density branded or community-based offerings.• ⏳ Exit Timeline: 14–28 MonthsInvestors are flipping during construction or just before handover — without ever furnishing or renting.It’s velocity, not holding, that defines this bracket.• 🧭 Supply Timing = ROI AccelerationThe sweet spot? Early phases in areas where infrastructure is 90% complete, but sentiment is still 60% priced in.• 🏗️ Developer Credibility = Exit PremiumsProjects from developers with clear delivery records + resale support ecosystems =Higher resale volume, faster assignments, and better buyer trust.• 🔒 Limited Supply, Locked-in PricingIn a market where new launches keep inflating, locked-in early bird pricing becomes its own asset.Investors are monetizing access, not just appreciation.Growiieze Final Thought:Dubai’s best real estate returns aren’t always made after handover.They’re made between the brochure and the balcony.Because when timing, product, and zone align —capital moves before the cranes stop.hashtag#GrowiiezePerspective hashtag#DubaiRealEstate hashtag#SmartInvestinghashtag#OffPlanReturns hashtag#CapitalVelocity hashtag#HNIStrategyhashtag#ROIInsights hashtag#BuiltWithPurpose hashtag#RealEstateLogichashtag#InvestorLens hashtag#Dubai2025 hashtag#AssetStackinghashtag#ExitBeforeHandover hashtag#GlobalCapitalFlow hashtag#GrowiiezeInsightshashtag#MiddleEastGrowth hashtag#PropertyInvestment hashtag#Dubai

سعدت بالمشاركة في تمثيل Oman Airports Management Company ضمن جناح “إكتشف عُمان” في سوق السفر العربي 2025 بدبي على مدى 4 ايام والذي أُقيم خلال الفترة من 28 إبريل إلى 1 مايو 2025.يعد هذا المعرض السنوي من أبرز الفعاليات العالمية في قطاع السفر والسياحة، حيث يجمع أبرز الجهات في القطاع من مختلف دول العالم لتعزيز التعاون والشراكات. وقد شكل المعرض فرصة قيّمة لعرض المقومات السياحية الفريدة لسلطنة عُمان، وتسليط الضوء على دور مطاراتنا كمحور استراتيجي للسياحة الى جانب تعزيز التواصل مع الشركاء الإقليميين والدوليين.نتوجه بجزيل الشكر الى Ministry of Heritage and Tourism - Sultanate of Oman على جهودهم المستمرة لتعزيز السياحة في عُمان وابراز ثراء عُمان الثقافي للعالم.I was pleased to represent Oman Airports Management Company as part of the “Experience Oman” pavilion at Arabian Travel Market 2025 in Dubai, held over four days from April 28 to May 1, 2025.This annual exhibition is one of the world’s leading events in the travel and tourism sector, bringing together key industry players from around the globe to foster collaboration and build partnerships.The event provided a valuable opportunity to showcase the unique tourism potential of the Sultanate of Oman, highlight the strategic role of our airports in supporting tourism, and strengthen engagement with regional and international partners.We extend our sincere thanks to the Ministry of Heritage and Tourism - Sultanate of Oman for their continuous efforts to promote tourism in Oman and highlight the richness of Omani culture on the global stage.

كتير بنقدم على شغل و بيطلب منك تبعت voice note تعرف نفسك بالانجلش و لو بعته غلط او مبعتش خالص مش بيترد عليك "دة اول سؤال في اي انترفيو"-introduce yourself in English or: -tell me about yourself in English or: -brand yourself or: -could you tell me a brief about yourself ? اللى هو "عرف نفسك"-بالرغم من بساطة السؤال ، إلا أنه مهم جدا و في ناس كتير مش بتعرف تجاوب علية صح - اول حاجة لو اتسألت انجلش يبقي هتجاوب انجلش و (هنا بيبقي عايز يقيم اللغة عندك) ، فالبتالى لازم تكون مجهز اجابتة كويس و مظبطها بالانجلش ، لو اتسألت عربي تجاوب عربي .- و بلاش تقول تفاصيل شخصية زي عندك كام اخ و اخت او اخواتك بيشتغلو اية -نقدر نقسم سؤال ال introduction in English ل 5 نقط مهمة :1. personal information -المعلومات الشخصيهو دى بتقول فيها اسمك و سنك و محل اقامتك ex:- My name is (Ahmed), I'm 24 (twenty four) years old, i live in (Maadi)2. Education-مؤهلك الدراسيالكلية و الجامعة اللى اتخرجت منها و سنة التخرج ex: i graduated from faculty of (commerce) accounting (department) with overall good (grad) in 2022 (twenty twenty two) (or) I've a bachelor's degree in accounting form faculty of commerce.....و نكمل بنفس الطريقة 3. your experience -خبراتك السابقةو دى بتقول فيها الشغل اللى اشتغلتة ( من الاحدث للاقدم ).بتوضح الاول( طبيعة شغلك) و بعدها (المكان العمل) او( اسم الشركة) و بعدها )الوقت او المدة) بدات الشغل امتى و سيبتة امتىex: about my work experience, -currently... I'm working as a (call center agent) at (xy company) for 7 (seven) months , started from January twenty twenty four till now -before this , i worked as a (sales assistant) at (xyz company) .و نكمل بنفس الطريقة -و يا سلام بئا لو اتكلمت عن طبيعه شغلك و انت كنت بتعمل اية و تقول .. I'm responsible for......- طيب لو انت fresh grade و مشتغلتش قبل كدة ! 4. personal skills- المهارات الشخصيةهنا بنقول المهارات اللى عندنا اللى بتميزك عن غيرك في شخصيتك زي مثلابتعرف تشتغل تحت ضغط و مهاراتك في الكومبيوتر زي مثلا انك بتعرف تشتغل على word & Excell او بتعرف تشتغل في البرمجة 5. courses, student activities.-هنا بنقول لو اخدت كورس او شاركت في انشطة طلابية -بنقول اسم الكورس و مكانة و اخدتة امتى- و كذلك الانشطة الطلابية ، اسم النشاط و كنت بتعمل في اية ! (طبيعة المشاركة).ex: -i trained/ I've got an internship training / at (x company) in 2023 .- I've taken a (summer internship training) / (Microsoft office courses) at (xy) in 2019 - when i was a student: participated in ..../ i was a member in....as a (pr / hr /....) in 2017-about my skills: i can work under pressure .....∆ بالرغم من ان اجابة السؤال دة مش هتاخد منك دقيقه، لكن هي مهمة جدا و بتفرق جدا في تقيمك و قبولك فالانترڤيواية الاسئلة اللى محتاجين اتكلم عنها الفترة الجاية؟hashtag#hashtag hashtag#Tips_hashtag hashtag#trickshashtag#hashtag hashtag#Counselor_Khaled_Al_Ansari hashtag#hashtaginterviewtips_hashtag hashtag#interview

Hello, just prepared some notes for my Ethiopian Fellows who are looking for opportunities in UAE.This is just from my personal experience, not a professional guide but one common question I get is: “Should I come to Dubai to find a job or apply from Ethiopia?"Both options work. If you get hired from Ethiopia, your employer will process your employment visa which is ideal. But most interviews in Dubai happen face-to-face, so being here increases your chances of getting hired faster.The other thing to consider is looking for an intern or entry‑level hire as many Dubai companies will sponsor your work permit even if you have no local experience, and internships often convert into full‑time roles compared to mid-senior to senior positions as most of the companies require UAE experience. I highly suggest you to be active on LinkedIn, follow companies with the industry that aligns to you and message HR staff as the connection you build is highly valuable, even if you might not get a fast result in the long term it will highly benefits you in your career advancement.Make sure your cv is tailored and ATS friendly based on the job description and prepare a cover letter for each application (See this guide written by GulfTalent on how to prepare your cv https://lnkd.in/dyDituwF ).One important thing to keep in mind is the job market is competitive so it's better to have strong technical skills and Prepare a portfolio of your past work or projects. This helps you stand out and gives employers something concrete to review during interviews.Try to do a research about things like: Cost of living, Visa process and Company reputation once you start getting offers. Just a reminder NEVER PAY anyone that says "we will provide you the job but you have pay for admin fee, visa fee or any other form of payment.These are sites commonly used for the job search here beyond the company portal:- https://www.linkedin.com/- https://ae.indeed.com/ - https://lnkd.in/d2D-PXAd- https://lnkd.in/drzMFAvz- https://lnkd.in/dQZuhvnyBeyond the above job portals focus on the company's portal as well as some applications require a detailed application process, they upload it on their career page.Hope this helps someone out there maybe I will add some additional guide. Feel free to share, comment, or message me if you have questions and I will try to answer them.

Post Content:
Our 4th episode of hashtag#Psych_Legal_Talk is out to be shared with you, if you have an interest in the subject of the divorce of Muslims in the UAE, applying UAE Federal Decree Law 41 of 2024on Personal Status matters.We discuss how Sharia allows a man to pronounce his No-Fault Divorce, his Talaq, and a woman to file for divorce or Khula, while the UAE Non Muslims Laws allow women and men the same right of No Fault Divorce, and grants compensation payable by the party who has caused the end of the marriage.Muslims Law is unfortunately void of any mention of compensation to be paid to the party who has suffered harm by the other party, allowing divorce without any  reprecussions.  To watch the episode please visit the YouTube link below.https://lnkd.in/dhRSP5xwالحلقة الرابعة من hashtag#Psych_Legal_Talk أصبحت متاحة الآن!في هذه الحلقة، نغوص في موضوع طلاق المسلمين في قانون دولة الإمارات، وخاصة في ضوء المرسوم بقانون اتحادي رقم 41 لسنة 2024 بشأن الأحوال الشخصية.تجيز الشريعة للرجل المسلم إصدار الطلاق بدون إثبات ضرر أو سبب (الطلاق التعسفي)، بينما تمنح قوانين الإمارات الخاصة بغير المسلمين الحق المتساوي للرجال والنساء في طلب الطلاق بدون خطأ، كما تُتيح تعويضاً مالياً للطرف المتضرر من انهيار العلاقة الزوجية.لكن و الأسف فإن قانون الأحوال الشخصية للمسلمين في الإمارات لا يتضمن حالياً أي نصوص تتعلق بتعويض الطرف المتضرر، مما يعرض مؤسسة الزواج للانتهاك و عدم التقدير.تابعونا بينما نستعرض الأبعاد القانونية والنفسية والاجتماعية لهذه القضية.امشاهدة الحلقة على اليوتيوب الرجاء الضغط على الرابط https://lnkd.in/dhRSP5xw

Dubai's population boom is creating unprecedented real estate opportunities for investors. In the first quarter of 2025 alone, the city welcomed nearly 90,000 new residents, equating to almost 1,000 individuals daily. This surge in population isn't merely a statistic; it's a clear indicator of escalating demand for housing, infrastructure, and commercial properties that surpasses all expectations.For investors, this surge signifies an ideal moment to establish a presence in a market where various sectors are experiencing remarkable growth:- Apartment prices have risen by 20% year-on-year- Villa prices have seen a significant surge of 29%- Office rents have escalated by over 20%- Residential rents are steadily increasingAlthough there is an anticipated influx of over 61,000 new units in 2025, the existing demand levels suggest that this supply may not be adequate to rebalance the market dynamics. For those with a long-term investment perspective, it's crucial to note that Dubai is not just attracting residents but also talent, capital, and businesses. The rapid population growth forms the cornerstone of real estate value, and in Dubai, this growth is occurring at an unprecedented pace.If you are considering transforming these statistics into profitable returns, let's engage in a conversation. 📌 يعني إيه Skill Inventory؟ وليه هو مهم لأي HR؟ 🧐 من أهم الأدوات اللي بتساعد الـ HR إنه يكون دايمًا جاهز لأي احتياج أو قرار في الشركة هي Skill Inventory أو "جرد المهارات"! 🎯🧠وده ببساطة عبارة عن قاعدة بيانات شاملة بتجمع المهارات الفعلية لكل الموظفين في الشركة. مش بس المسمى الوظيفي أو التخصص، لكن كمان المهارات الحقيقية اللي بيستخدموها في شغلهم ✅🔍 ليه نعمل Skill Inventory؟🔹 نحدد الفجوات المهارية بدقة 🕵️‍♂️ 🔹 نخطط للتدريب والتطوير (TNA) بناءً على احتياج حقيقي 📈 🔹 نستعد للتعاقب الوظيفي (Succession Planning) 🔄 🔹 نوزع المهام بشكل أذكى 🧩 🔹 نحدد الترقيات وفرص التطوير بناءً على إمكانيات فعلية مش مجرد توقعات 🪄📂 إزاي نبدأ؟1️⃣ اجمع بيانات المهارات من مصادر مختلفة: 📄 الـ CV – 🗣️ مقابلات – 📊 تقييم الأداء – 👨‍💼 المدير المباشر2️⃣ صنّف المهارات حسب نوعها:🗣️ Language Skills: زي اللغة الإنجليزية، الفرنسية... 💼 Technical Skills: التسويق الرقمي، المحاسبة، البرمجة... 🤝 Soft Skills: القيادة، التواصل، العمل الجماعي... 💻 Computer Skills: Excel – PowerPoint – HRIS Systems...3️⃣ افصل كمان المهارات حسب المستوى الوظيفي:👤 Specialist 🧑‍💼 Senior 👨‍💼 Team Lead / Manager✅ كده تقدر تبني صورة أوضح لكل موظف في الشركة وتحدد: 🔹 مين محتاج يتطور في إيه؟ 🔹 مين يقدر يترقى أو يمسك مشروع معين؟ 🔹 إزاي تبني خطة تطوير حقيقية مبنية على الواقع مش الافتراضات؟📌 خليك فاكر! Skill Inventory مش مجرد ملف، ده أداة قوية بتخلي قراراتك مبنية على بيانات حقيقية، وتساعدك تخطط وتطور شركتك بالشكل الصح 💪📊

UAE Breaks Global Barriers: Introducing the World’s Boldest AI Education Revolution for Future GenerationsIn a move that places the UAE firmly at the forefront of global innovation, the government has officially approved the introduction of Artificial Intelligence (AI) as a mandatory subject across all public schools from kindergarten to grade 12 starting with the 2025–2026 academic year.Let’s break this down:Global AI Landscape: Where the World Stands1. The global AI market is projected to soar from $207 billion (2023) to over $1.85 trillion by 2030 2. PwC forecasts AI will contribute $15.7 trillion to the global economy by 2030 more than the combined GDP of China and India today.3. Yet fewer than 11 countries worldwide currently have government-endorsed K-12 AI curricula (UNESCO, 2024), putting the UAE at the very top of global innovators.The Workforce Revolution:• The World Economic Forum’s 2025 Future of Jobs Report projects:1. 170 million new jobs will be created globally by 2030.2. 92 million jobs will be displaced.3. Net gain: 78 million new roles many of them requiring advanced digital and AI-related skills.• Employers estimate 39% of workers core skills will change by 2030, underscoring the urgency of early, system-wide reskilling.UAE’s AI Strategy 2031:• Boost AI’s share of national GDP by 14% (≈AED 335–352 billion).• Embed AI across priority sectors: healthcare, transportation, climate, renewable energy, and education.• Rank among the world’s top 10 in AI innovation, governance, and testing.• Expand the digital economy’s non-oil GDP share from 11.7% to 20% by the early 2030s.What Makes the UAE’s Curriculum Unique?This isn’t just about teaching kids to code.It’s about:1. Deep understanding of data, algorithms, and ethical frameworks.2. Raising awareness of AI’s societal risks, biases, and transformative power.3. Equipping youth to become creators, regulators, and global innovators not passive tech consumers.Why the UAE Stands Alone GloballyWhere many advanced economies are still debating risks or running small-scale pilots, the UAE is:→ Institutionalizing AI literacy at scale.→ Building national, homegrown AI talent.→ Shaping international benchmarks for ethical, inclusive innovation.This aligns with the country’s boldest ambitions:1. UAE Centennial 2071 to be the best nation in the world by its centenary.2. Dubai Economic Agenda D33 to double the city’s economy in a decade.3. National Innovation Strategy with AI as a central pillar for growth.As HH Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum stated:“Our responsibility is to equip our children for a time unlike ours… with new skills and capabilities to ensure the continued momentum of development and progress in our nation for decades to come.”The UAE is not just preparing to participate in the global AI race it is setting the pace for the world to follow.

The difference lies in knowing where to look, how to analyze the market, and when to act.Real estate investing isn’t about luck—it’s about vision. Abay Bank S.C. establishment was back in 2002, and started its official operations on October 25, 2003 (based on the Ethiopian Calendar) with a subscribed capital of Birr 174.5 million and a paid-up capital of Birr 125.8 million. With a 7 million birr worth invested brand new logo, since then cultivates a strong local presence, often feeling like the community's steadfast guardian accompanied by 823 founding members and 4,537 shareholders as of  2024.Its innovative mobile platforms hum with the energy of the Blue Nile (also known as Ethiopia’s Great Abay River), connecting rural and urban customers seamlessly, has made it a leading financial institution in Ethiopia. The fact is the River presents a wealth of opportunities for harnessing its power to drive economic growth and development as it holds a significant place in the country’s natural landscape and cultural heritage that embodies the country's ambitious spirit in the long-run.Overall, Abay Bank, while perhaps not the flashiest one in the list, the company’s reliability as well as best-in-class banking services echoes the enduring strength of the country's highlands. Labelled as a “SOURCE OF GREATNESS,” it is a catalyst for growth through empowering people, and driving the engine to unlock their full potential by aiming to reach heights they never thought possible regarding the economic, and ecological importance of Ethiopia. Kentucky Derby (since 1875) → the most-watched horse race in America; $400M in betting handle yearly: 16.7 million global viewers.2. 2000 Guineas Stakes (since 1809) → part of Britain’s Five Classics; top-tier breeding influence across Europe, Asia, and the Middle East.3. 1000 Guineas Stakes (since 1814) → Britain’s premier Classic for 3-year-old fillies; major international breeding and racing impact.4. Kentucky Oaks → 100,000 live spectators: millions of global viewers: elite Grade 1 platform for 3-year-old fillies.Godolphin Global Footprint (2025 Snapshot)1. Founded: 19922. Victories: Over 5,800 global wins across 14 countries3. Major trophies: Dubai World Cup, Melbourne Cup, Epsom Derby, Breeders’ Cup, Prix de l’Arc de Triomphe4. Top recognitions:5. What Really Happens Before You Become a Law Firm Client in the UAE ?When a new client approaches a law firm, most people imagine the legal work starts with a consultation or drafting documents. But in reality, a lot happens behind the scenes before we ever say, "How can we help you?"In my latest article, I share a real-world look at what UAE law firms (including myself as a legal professional) do before onboarding a new client. This includes:✅ KYC and AML due diligence – not just box-ticking, but real risk and identity screening ✅ Conflict-of-interest checks – because ethics matter as much as expertise ✅ Reputational and risk assessments – who we represent says a lot about who we are ✅ Clearly defining scope and fees – to avoid surprises down the road ✅ Formal engagement and internal approvals – ensuring everything is by the bookOnboarding isn't just admin work — it's a key part of protecting both the firm and the client. If you're in the legal industry, or even just curious about what happens before a lawyer takes your case, I think you'll find it insightful.hashtag#KYC hashtag#Compliance hashtag#AML hashtag#Lawfirms hashtag#Dubai hashtag#ConflictCheck

From Launch to Exit:How Dubai’s Best Projects Create Returns Before They’re Built— A Growiieze PerspectiveIn most markets, you buy. You wait. You exit.In Dubai, the smartest investors?They’re exiting before handover.Because in well-zoned, well-timed off-plan projects —value isn’t created at completion.It’s created during construction.Here’s how:• 📈 15%–35% Value Uplift Pre-HandoverTop-tier off-plan projects have seen capital appreciation from launch to handover ranging between 15%–35% — especially in low-density branded or community-based offerings.• ⏳ Exit Timeline: 14–28 MonthsInvestors are flipping during construction or just before handover — without ever furnishing or renting.It’s velocity, not holding, that defines this bracket.• 🧭 Supply Timing = ROI AccelerationThe sweet spot? Early phases in areas where infrastructure is 90% complete, but sentiment is still 60% priced in.• 🏗️ Developer Credibility = Exit PremiumsProjects from developers with clear delivery records + resale support ecosystems =Higher resale volume, faster assignments, and better buyer trust.• 🔒 Limited Supply, Locked-in PricingIn a market where new launches keep inflating, locked-in early bird pricing becomes its own asset.Investors are monetizing access, not just appreciation.Growiieze Final Thought:Dubai’s best real estate returns aren’t always made after handover.They’re made between the brochure and the balcony.Because when timing, product, and zone align —capital moves before the cranes stop.hashtag#GrowiiezePerspective hashtag#DubaiRealEstate hashtag#SmartInvestinghashtag#OffPlanReturns hashtag#CapitalVelocity hashtag#HNIStrategyhashtag#ROIInsights hashtag#BuiltWithPurpose hashtag#RealEstateLogichashtag#InvestorLens hashtag#Dubai2025 hashtag#AssetStackinghashtag#ExitBeforeHandover hashtag#GlobalCapitalFlow hashtag#GrowiiezeInsightshashtag#MiddleEastGrowth hashtag#PropertyInvestment hashtag#Dubai

سعدت بالمشاركة في تمثيل Oman Airports Management Company ضمن جناح “إكتشف عُمان” في سوق السفر العربي 2025 بدبي على مدى 4 ايام والذي أُقيم خلال الفترة من 28 إبريل إلى 1 مايو 2025.يعد هذا المعرض السنوي من أبرز الفعاليات العالمية في قطاع السفر والسياحة، حيث يجمع أبرز الجهات في القطاع من مختلف دول العالم لتعزيز التعاون والشراكات. وقد شكل المعرض فرصة قيّمة لعرض المقومات السياحية الفريدة لسلطنة عُمان، وتسليط الضوء على دور مطاراتنا كمحور استراتيجي للسياحة الى جانب تعزيز التواصل مع الشركاء الإقليميين والدوليين.نتوجه بجزيل الشكر الى Ministry of Heritage and Tourism - Sultanate of Oman على جهودهم المستمرة لتعزيز السياحة في عُمان وابراز ثراء عُمان الثقافي للعالم.I was pleased to represent Oman Airports Management Company as part of the “Experience Oman” pavilion at Arabian Travel Market 2025 in Dubai, held over four days from April 28 to May 1, 2025.This annual exhibition is one of the world’s leading events in the travel and tourism sector, bringing together key industry players from around the globe to foster collaboration and build partnerships.The event provided a valuable opportunity to showcase the unique tourism potential of the Sultanate of Oman, highlight the strategic role of our airports in supporting tourism, and strengthen engagement with regional and international partners.We extend our sincere thanks to the Ministry of Heritage and Tourism - Sultanate of Oman for their continuous efforts to promote tourism in Oman and highlight the richness of Omani culture on the global stage.

كتير بنقدم على شغل و بيطلب منك تبعت voice note تعرف نفسك بالانجلش و لو بعته غلط او مبعتش خالص مش بيترد عليك "دة اول سؤال في اي انترفيو"-introduce yourself in English or: -tell me about yourself in English or: -brand yourself or: -could you tell me a brief about yourself ? اللى هو "عرف نفسك"-بالرغم من بساطة السؤال ، إلا أنه مهم جدا و في ناس كتير مش بتعرف تجاوب علية صح - اول حاجة لو اتسألت انجلش يبقي هتجاوب انجلش و (هنا بيبقي عايز يقيم اللغة عندك) ، فالبتالى لازم تكون مجهز اجابتة كويس و مظبطها بالانجلش ، لو اتسألت عربي تجاوب عربي .- و بلاش تقول تفاصيل شخصية زي عندك كام اخ و اخت او اخواتك بيشتغلو اية -نقدر نقسم سؤال ال introduction in English ل 5 نقط مهمة :1. personal information -المعلومات الشخصيهو دى بتقول فيها اسمك و سنك و محل اقامتك ex:- My name is (Ahmed), I'm 24 (twenty four) years old, i live in (Maadi)2. Education-مؤهلك الدراسيالكلية و الجامعة اللى اتخرجت منها و سنة التخرج ex: i graduated from faculty of (commerce) accounting (department) with overall good (grad) in 2022 (twenty twenty two) (or) I've a bachelor's degree in accounting form faculty of commerce.....و نكمل بنفس الطريقة 3. your experience -خبراتك السابقةو دى بتقول فيها الشغل اللى اشتغلتة ( من الاحدث للاقدم ).بتوضح الاول( طبيعة شغلك) و بعدها (المكان العمل) او( اسم الشركة) و بعدها )الوقت او المدة) بدات الشغل امتى و سيبتة امتىex: about my work experience, -currently... I'm working as a (call center agent) at (xy company) for 7 (seven) months , started from January twenty twenty four till now -before this , i worked as a (sales assistant) at (xyz company) .و نكمل بنفس الطريقة -و يا سلام بئا لو اتكلمت عن طبيعه شغلك و انت كنت بتعمل اية و تقول .. I'm responsible for......- طيب لو انت fresh grade و مشتغلتش قبل كدة ! 4. personal skills- المهارات الشخصيةهنا بنقول المهارات اللى عندنا اللى بتميزك عن غيرك في شخصيتك زي مثلابتعرف تشتغل تحت ضغط و مهاراتك في الكومبيوتر زي مثلا انك بتعرف تشتغل على word & Excell او بتعرف تشتغل في البرمجة 5. courses, student activities.-هنا بنقول لو اخدت كورس او شاركت في انشطة طلابية -بنقول اسم الكورس و مكانة و اخدتة امتى- و كذلك الانشطة الطلابية ، اسم النشاط و كنت بتعمل في اية ! (طبيعة المشاركة).ex: -i trained/ I've got an internship training / at (x company) in 2023 .- I've taken a (summer internship training) / (Microsoft office courses) at (xy) in 2019 - when i was a student: participated in ..../ i was a member in....as a (pr / hr /....) in 2017-about my skills: i can work under pressure .....∆ بالرغم من ان اجابة السؤال دة مش هتاخد منك دقيقه، لكن هي مهمة جدا و بتفرق جدا في تقيمك و قبولك فالانترڤيواية الاسئلة اللى محتاجين اتكلم عنها الفترة الجاية؟hashtag#hashtag hashtag#Tips_hashtag hashtag#trickshashtag#hashtag hashtag#Counselor_Khaled_Al_Ansari hashtag#hashtaginterviewtips_hashtag hashtag#interview

Hello, just prepared some notes for my Ethiopian Fellows who are looking for opportunities in UAE.This is just from my personal experience, not a professional guide but one common question I get is: “Should I come to Dubai to find a job or apply from Ethiopia?"Both options work. If you get hired from Ethiopia, your employer will process your employment visa which is ideal. But most interviews in Dubai happen face-to-face, so being here increases your chances of getting hired faster.The other thing to consider is looking for an intern or entry‑level hire as many Dubai companies will sponsor your work permit even if you have no local experience, and internships often convert into full‑time roles compared to mid-senior to senior positions as most of the companies require UAE experience. I highly suggest you to be active on LinkedIn, follow companies with the industry that aligns to you and message HR staff as the connection you build is highly valuable, even if you might not get a fast result in the long term it will highly benefits you in your career advancement.Make sure your cv is tailored and ATS friendly based on the job description and prepare a cover letter for each application (See this guide written by GulfTalent on how to prepare your cv https://lnkd.in/dyDituwF ).One important thing to keep in mind is the job market is competitive so it's better to have strong technical skills and Prepare a portfolio of your past work or projects. This helps you stand out and gives employers something concrete to review during interviews.Try to do a research about things like: Cost of living, Visa process and Company reputation once you start getting offers. Just a reminder NEVER PAY anyone that says "we will provide you the job but you have pay for admin fee, visa fee or any other form of payment.These are sites commonly used for the job search here beyond the company portal:- https://www.linkedin.com/- https://ae.indeed.com/ - https://lnkd.in/d2D-PXAd- https://lnkd.in/drzMFAvz- https://lnkd.in/dQZuhvnyBeyond the above job portals focus on the company's portal as well as some applications require a detailed application process, they upload it on their career page.Hope this helps someone out there maybe I will add some additional guide. Feel free to share, comment, or message me if you have questions and I will try to answer them.

Post Content:
Our 4th episode of hashtag#Psych_Legal_Talk is out to be shared with you, if you have an interest in the subject of the divorce of Muslims in the UAE, applying UAE Federal Decree Law 41 of 2024on Personal Status matters.We discuss how Sharia allows a man to pronounce his No-Fault Divorce, his Talaq, and a woman to file for divorce or Khula, while the UAE Non Muslims Laws allow women and men the same right of No Fault Divorce, and grants compensation payable by the party who has caused the end of the marriage.Muslims Law is unfortunately void of any mention of compensation to be paid to the party who has suffered harm by the other party, allowing divorce without any  reprecussions.  To watch the episode please visit the YouTube link below.https://lnkd.in/dhRSP5xwالحلقة الرابعة من hashtag#Psych_Legal_Talk أصبحت متاحة الآن!في هذه الحلقة، نغوص في موضوع طلاق المسلمين في قانون دولة الإمارات، وخاصة في ضوء المرسوم بقانون اتحادي رقم 41 لسنة 2024 بشأن الأحوال الشخصية.تجيز الشريعة للرجل المسلم إصدار الطلاق بدون إثبات ضرر أو سبب (الطلاق التعسفي)، بينما تمنح قوانين الإمارات الخاصة بغير المسلمين الحق المتساوي للرجال والنساء في طلب الطلاق بدون خطأ، كما تُتيح تعويضاً مالياً للطرف المتضرر من انهيار العلاقة الزوجية.لكن و الأسف فإن قانون الأحوال الشخصية للمسلمين في الإمارات لا يتضمن حالياً أي نصوص تتعلق بتعويض الطرف المتضرر، مما يعرض مؤسسة الزواج للانتهاك و عدم التقدير.تابعونا بينما نستعرض الأبعاد القانونية والنفسية والاجتماعية لهذه القضية.امشاهدة الحلقة على اليوتيوب الرجاء الضغط على الرابط https://lnkd.in/dhRSP5xw

Dubai's population boom is creating unprecedented real estate opportunities for investors. In the first quarter of 2025 alone, the city welcomed nearly 90,000 new residents, equating to almost 1,000 individuals daily. This surge in population isn't merely a statistic; it's a clear indicator of escalating demand for housing, infrastructure, and commercial properties that surpasses all expectations.For investors, this surge signifies an ideal moment to establish a presence in a market where various sectors are experiencing remarkable growth:- Apartment prices have risen by 20% year-on-year- Villa prices have seen a significant surge of 29%- Office rents have escalated by over 20%- Residential rents are steadily increasingAlthough there is an anticipated influx of over 61,000 new units in 2025, the existing demand levels suggest that this supply may not be adequate to rebalance the market dynamics. For those with a long-term investment perspective, it's crucial to note that Dubai is not just attracting residents but also talent, capital, and businesses. The rapid population growth forms the cornerstone of real estate value, and in Dubai, this growth is occurring at an unprecedented pace.If you are considering transforming these statistics into profitable returns, let's engage in a conversation. Our team is on-site and prepared to provide you with expert guidance on seizing the opportunities presented by Dubai's thriving real estate market.hashtag#DubaiRealEstate hashtag#PropertyInvestment hashtag#UAEGrowth hashtag#HiveNetwork hashtag#InvestorInsight hashtag#RealEstate2025 hashtag#PopulationBoom hashtag#SmartInvesting

📌 يعني إيه Skill Inventory؟ وليه هو مهم لأي HR؟ 🧐 من أهم الأدوات اللي بتساعد الـ HR إنه يكون دايمًا جاهز لأي احتياج أو قرار في الشركة هي Skill Inventory أو "جرد المهارات"! 🎯🧠وده ببساطة عبارة عن قاعدة بيانات شاملة بتجمع المهارات الفعلية لكل الموظفين في الشركة. مش بس المسمى الوظيفي أو التخصص، لكن كمان المهارات الحقيقية اللي بيستخدموها في شغلهم ✅🔍 ليه نعمل Skill Inventory؟🔹 نحدد الفجوات المهارية بدقة 🕵️‍♂️ 🔹 نخطط للتدريب والتطوير (TNA) بناءً على احتياج حقيقي 📈 🔹 نستعد للتعاقب الوظيفي (Succession Planning) 🔄 🔹 نوزع المهام بشكل أذكى 🧩 🔹 نحدد الترقيات وفرص التطوير بناءً على إمكانيات فعلية مش مجرد توقعات 🪄📂 إزاي نبدأ؟1️⃣ اجمع بيانات المهارات من مصادر مختلفة: 📄 الـ CV – 🗣️ مقابلات – 📊 تقييم الأداء – 👨‍💼 المدير المباشر2️⃣ صنّف المهارات حسب نوعها:🗣️ Language Skills: زي اللغة الإنجليزية، الفرنسية... 💼 Technical Skills: التسويق الرقمي، المحاسبة، البرمجة... 🤝 Soft Skills: القيادة، التواصل، العمل الجماعي... 💻 Computer Skills: Excel – PowerPoint – HRIS Systems...3️⃣ افصل كمان المهارات حسب المستوى الوظيفي:👤 Specialist 🧑‍💼 Senior 👨‍💼 Team Lead / Manager✅ كده تقدر تبني صورة أوضح لكل موظف في الشركة وتحدد: 🔹 مين محتاج يتطور في إيه؟ 🔹 مين يقدر يترقى أو يمسك مشروع معين؟ 🔹 إزاي تبني خطة تطوير حقيقية مبنية على الواقع مش الافتراضات؟📌 خليك فاكر! Skill Inventory مش مجرد ملف، ده أداة قوية بتخلي قراراتك مبنية على بيانات حقيقية، وتساعدك تخطط وتطور شركتك بالشكل الصح 💪📊

UAE Breaks Global Barriers: Introducing the World’s Boldest AI Education Revolution for Future GenerationsIn a move that places the UAE firmly at the forefront of global innovation, the government has officially approved the introduction of Artificial Intelligence (AI) as a mandatory subject across all public schools from kindergarten to grade 12 starting with the 2025–2026 academic year.Let’s break this down:Global AI Landscape: Where the World Stands1. The global AI market is projected to soar from $207 billion (2023) to over $1.85 trillion by 2030 2. PwC forecasts AI will contribute $15.7 trillion to the global economy by 2030 more than the combined GDP of China and India today.3. Yet fewer than 11 countries worldwide currently have government-endorsed K-12 AI curricula (UNESCO, 2024), putting the UAE at the very top of global innovators.The Workforce Revolution:• The World Economic Forum’s 2025 Future of Jobs Report projects:1. 170 million new jobs will be created globally by 2030.2. 92 million jobs will be displaced.3. Net gain: 78 million new roles many of them requiring advanced digital and AI-related skills.• Employers estimate 39% of workers core skills will change by 2030, underscoring the urgency of early, system-wide reskilling.UAE’s AI Strategy 2031:• Boost AI’s share of national GDP by 14% (≈AED 335–352 billion).• Embed AI across priority sectors: healthcare, transportation, climate, renewable energy, and education.• Rank among the world’s top 10 in AI innovation, governance, and testing.• Expand the digital economy’s non-oil GDP share from 11.7% to 20% by the early 2030s.What Makes the UAE’s Curriculum Unique?This isn’t just about teaching kids to code.It’s about:1. Deep understanding of data, algorithms, and ethical frameworks.2. Raising awareness of AI’s societal risks, biases, and transformative power.3. Equipping youth to become creators, regulators, and global innovators not passive tech consumers.Why the UAE Stands Alone GloballyWhere many advanced economies are still debating risks or running small-scale pilots, the UAE is:→ Institutionalizing AI literacy at scale.→ Building national, homegrown AI talent.→ Shaping international benchmarks for ethical, inclusive innovation.This aligns with the country’s boldest ambitions:1. UAE Centennial 2071 to be the best nation in the world by its centenary.2. Dubai Economic Agenda D33 to double the city’s economy in a decade.3. National Innovation Strategy with AI as a central pillar for growth.As HH Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum stated:“Our responsibility is to equip our children for a time unlike ours… with new skills and capabilities to ensure the continued momentum of development and progress in our nation for decades to come.”The UAE is not just preparing to participate in the global AI race it is setting the pace for the world to follow.

Abay Bank S.C. establishment was back in 2002, and started its official operations on October 25, 2003 (based on the Ethiopian Calendar) with a subscribed capital of Birr 174.5 million and a paid-up capital of Birr 125.8 million. With a 7 million birr worth invested brand new logo, since then cultivates a strong local presence, often feeling like the community's steadfast guardian accompanied by 823 founding members and 4,537 shareholders as of  2024.Its innovative mobile platforms hum with the energy of the Blue Nile (also known as Ethiopia’s Great Abay River), connecting rural and urban customers seamlessly, has made it a leading financial institution in Ethiopia. The fact is the River presents a wealth of opportunities for harnessing its power to drive economic growth and development as it holds a significant place in the country’s natural landscape and cultural heritage that embodies the country's ambitious spirit in the long-run.Overall, Abay Bank, while perhaps not the flashiest one in the list, the company’s reliability as well as best-in-class banking services echoes the enduring strength of the country's highlands. Labelled as a “SOURCE OF GREATNESS,” it is a catalyst for growth through empowering people, and driving the engine to unlock their full potential by aiming to reach heights they never thought possible regarding the economic, and ecological importance of Ethiopia. A Global Equestrian Masterclass: Dubai’s Godolphin Dominates Four Elite Racing Crowns in One Historic WeekendThis weekend, under the visionary leadership of HH Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Dubai’s Godolphin Racing achieved what few in history have ever done claiming victories across four of the world’s most prestigious horse races:🏇 Kentucky Oaks (USA): Good Cheer🏇 Kentucky Derby (USA): Sovereignty🏇 2000 Guineas (UK): Ruling Court🏇 1000 Guineas (UK): Desert FlowerThis is not just about winning races this is about cementing Dubai’s place at the pinnacle of global sporting and cultural leadership.Why This Matters — and What the Numbers Reveal1. Kentucky Derby (since 1875) → the most-watched horse race in America; $400M in betting handle yearly: 16.7 million global viewers.2. 2000 Guineas Stakes (since 1809) → part of Britain’s Five Classics; top-tier breeding influence across Europe, Asia, and the Middle East.3. 1000 Guineas Stakes (since 1814) → Britain’s premier Classic for 3-year-old fillies; major international breeding and racing impact.4. Kentucky Oaks → 100,000 live spectators: millions of global viewers: elite Grade 1 platform for 3-year-old fillies.Godolphin Global Footprint (2025 Snapshot)1. Founded: 19922. Victories: Over 5,800 global wins across 14 countries3. Major trophies: Dubai World Cup, Melbourne Cup, Epsom Derby, Breeders’ Cup, Prix de l’Arc de Triomphe4. Top recognitions:5. Eclipse Awards (USA) → multiple-time leading owner6. Cartier Racing Awards (UK) → multiple-time owner of the year7. British Champions Series → dominant force in flat racing8. Breeding power: Darley, the Godolphin breeding arm, spans Europe, the U.S., Australia, and Japan, making it one of the world’s largest and most influential bloodstock operations.Strategic Significance: Beyond the RacetrackThis is not just sport it is Dubai’s global ambition in action:• Soft Power & Prestige → Elevating Dubai as a cultural and sporting superpower.• Economic Impact → Anchoring the UAE within a $300 billion global horse racing ecosystem.• Innovation & Excellence → Setting new global standards through advanced veterinary science, world-class training, and elite management.• Cultural Diplomacy → Deepening ties with Europe, the USA, Australia, and Asia showing the world the UAE’s commitment to excellence on every front.The Pride of a Nation, the Vision of a LeaderThis achievement belongs not only to the Godolphin horses, jockeys, and trainers it belongs to Dubai, to the UAE, and to every citizen who dares to dream big.Under the leadership of HH Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Dubai has once again shown the world that its ambition is boundless, its excellence unmatched, and its global leadership undeniable.Here’s to the blue silks, the roaring finish lines, and the unstoppable spirit of Dubai.This is how a nation writes history with courage, vision, and the relentless pursuit of greatness.

What Really Happens Before You Become a Law Firm Client in the UAE ?When a new client approaches a law firm, most people imagine the legal work starts with a consultation or drafting documents. But in reality, a lot happens behind the scenes before we ever say, "How can we help you?"In my latest article, I share a real-world look at what UAE law firms (including myself as a legal professional) do before onboarding a new client. This includes:✅ KYC and AML due diligence – not just box-ticking, but real risk and identity screening ✅ Conflict-of-interest checks – because ethics matter as much as expertise ✅ Reputational and risk assessments – who we represent says a lot about who we are ✅ Clearly defining scope and fees – to avoid surprises down the road ✅ Formal engagement and internal approvals – ensuring everything is by the bookOnboarding isn't just admin work — it's a key part of protecting both the firm and the client. If you're in the legal industry, or even just curious about what happens before a lawyer takes your case, I think you'll find it insightful.hashtag#KYC hashtag#Compliance hashtag#AML hashtag#Lawfirms hashtag#Dubai hashtag#ConflictCheck

اختتمت قطر للسياحة و Visit Qatar مشاركتهما بنجاح في النسخة الثانية والثلاثين من معرض سوق السفر العربي (ATM) 2025، والذي أُقيم في مركز دبي التجاري العالمي في الفترة من 28 أبريل إلى 1 مايو.وقادت Visit Qatar وقطر للسياحة وفداً يضم 46 من أبرز شركائها حيث تم تسليط الضوء على التنوع في عروض قطر السياحية من خلال جناح مميز نال جائزة من قبل منظمين المعرض لتصميمه المبتكر، والذي اعتمد على مواد صديقة للبيئة وتقنيات رقمية ذكية، بما يعكس دور دولة قطر الريادي في السياحة المستدامة. كما شهد الجناح زيارات رفيعة المستوى، وعدة اجتماعات رفيعة المستوى مع عدد من الشخصيات البارزة في قطاع السياحة الإقليمي والعالمي تركز البحث فيها على سبل التعاون الثنائي وتعزيز آفاق الشراكات الاستراتيجية.hashtag#قطر_للسياحة -Qatar Tourism and Visit Qatar successfully concluded their participation in the 32nd edition of the Arabian Travel Market (ATM) 2025, held from April 28 to May 1 at the Dubai World Trade Centre.Leading a delegation of 46 partners, Visit Qatar and Qatar Tourism showcased the country’s diverse tourism offerings in an innovative pavilion that was recognized with the Sustainability Award by ATM for its smart and eco-friendly design, reflecting the state of Qatar’s leadership in sustainable tourism.Qatar’s pavilion at ATM attracted high-level visits and hosted several meetings with prominent figures from the regional and global tourism sectors, where opportunities for bilateral cooperation and ways to enhance strategic partnerships were discussed.hashtag#QatarTourism
